verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Thank you Jesus
Thank you Jesus
Thank you Lord, For loving me
2X

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You went to Calvary
And there You died for me
Thank you Lord, For loving me
2X

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You rose up from the grave
New life to me You gave
Thank you Lord, For loving me
2X

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You're coming back again
That I might reign with You
Thank you Lord, For loving me
2X

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sing Hallelujah
Sing Hallelujah
Thank you Lord, For loving me
2X
